thoughtPairs.positive: Success is a journey, and I'm making progress
Some people enjoy my company, and I can build meaningful relationships
I have both strengths and areas for growth

thoughtPairs.negative: I should always know what to say
thoughtPairs.positive: It's okay to take time to process and respond

thoughtPairs.negative: One mistake will reveal I'm a total fraud
thoughtPairs.positive: Everyone makes mistakes, they don't define my worth

thoughtPairs.negative: Everyone else has their life figured out
thoughtPairs.positive: Most people also have doubts and struggles
I can build confidence gradually through small steps

thoughtPairs.negative: I should never need help from others
thoughtPairs.positive: Asking for help shows wisdom and self-awareness

thoughtPairs.negative: If I show vulnerability, people will reject me
I'm either successful at everything or a complete failure
thoughtPairs.positive: I can be good at some things while still learning others

thoughtPairs.negative: People only pretend to care about me
thoughtPairs.positive: There are people who genuinely value me

thoughtPairs.negative: I should have accomplished more by now
thoughtPairs.positive: Everyone has their own timeline for growth

thoughtPairs.negative: If I open up, everyone will see how broken I am
thoughtPairs.positive: Sharing struggles can help both myself and others

thoughtPairs.negative: My past mistakes prove I'm worthless
thoughtPairs.positive: Past mistakes are opportunities for learning and growth

thoughtPairs.negative: I'll never find someone who truly accepts me
thoughtPairs.positive: As I accept myself, I can attract genuine connections
